en: Narrator: Peppa and her family are going to the museum.
cn: 旁白：佩奇一家要去博物馆。

sentence.en: Peppa and her family are going to the museum.

examples.en: They are going to the zoo.
I am going to the library.

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, what is a museum?
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，博物馆是什么？

en: Daddy Pig: It’s a place full of interesting things that are very old.
cn: 猪爸爸：那里有很多有趣的古老东西。

sentence.en: It’s a place full of interesting things that are very old.
sentence.cn: 那里有很多有趣的古老东西。

examples.en: It’s a place full of books.
It’s a place full of toys.

en: Peppa Pig: Older than you?
cn: 小猪佩奇：比你还老吗？

en: Daddy Pig: Yes, even older than me.
cn: 猪爸爸：是的，比我还老。

en: Peppa Pig and George: Oo-oo.
cn: 小猪佩奇和乔治：呜——呜——。

en: Peppa Pig: Really old.
cn: 小猪佩奇：真的很老。

en: Mummy Pig: There’s one room that is full of things that belonged to kings and queens from long ago.
cn: 猪妈妈：有一个房间里全是很久以前国王和王后的东西。

points.en: things that belonged to kings and queens

en: Peppa Pig: I want to see the king and queen’s room.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我想看国王和王后的房间。

en: Daddy Pig: And there’s another room with a real dinosaur.
cn: 猪爸爸：还有一个房间有真的恐龙。

en: George: Wow, dinosaur, grr!
cn: 乔治：哇，恐龙，嗷！

en: Miss Rabbit: Hello, Mummy Pig.
cn: 兔小姐：你好，猪妈妈。

en: Mummy Pig: Hello, Miss Rabbit.
cn: 猪妈妈：你好，兔小姐。

en: Miss Rabbit: How many tickets, please?
cn: 兔小姐：请问几张票？

en: Mummy Pig: Two adults and two children.
cn: 猪妈妈：两张成人票，两张儿童票。

points.cn: 两张成人票，两张儿童票

en: George: Dinosaur, grr.
cn: 乔治：恐龙，嗷。

en: Miss Rabbit: And a dinosaur.
cn: 兔小姐：还有一只恐龙。

en: Narrator: Peppa wants to see the room full of things that belonged to kings and queens from long ago.
cn: 旁白：佩奇想看装满国王和王后物品的房间。

en: Peppa Pig: Wow!
cn: 小猪佩奇：哇！

en: George: Dinosaur?
cn: 乔治：恐龙？

en: Narrator: But George wants to see the real dinosaur.
cn: 旁白：但乔治想看真的恐龙。

en: Mummy Pig: Don’t worry, George. We will see the dinosaur next.
cn: 猪妈妈：别担心，乔治，等会儿就去看恐龙。

sentence.en: We will see the dinosaur next.

examples.en: We will see the books next.
We will see dolls next.

en: Mummy Pig: Peppa, these are all the things that the queen had a long time ago.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，这些都是很久以前王后的东西。

en: Mummy Pig: This is the queen’s special chair. It’s called a throne.
cn: 猪妈妈：这是王后的专用椅子，叫做王座。

en: Peppa Pig: It’s beautiful.
cn: 小猪佩奇：真漂亮。

en: Mummy Pig: This is the queen’s dress.
cn: 猪妈妈：这是王后的裙子。

en: Peppa Pig: It’s so pretty.
cn: 小猪佩奇：好漂亮。

examples.en: It’s so big.
It’s so small.

en: Mummy Pig: Look, Peppa. This is the queen’s golden crown.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，你看，这是王后的金色王冠。

en: Peppa Pig: Wow! What lovely things.
cn: 小猪佩奇：哇！这些东西真漂亮。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, where is the queen’s television?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，王后的电视在哪里？

en: Mummy Pig: They didn’t have television then.
cn: 猪妈妈：那时候还没有电视。

examples.en: They didn’t have computers then.
They didn’t have phones then.

en: Peppa Pig: No television? But they did have computers.
cn: 小猪佩奇：没有电视？那有电脑吗？

en: Mummy Pig: No, they didn’t have computers either.
cn: 猪妈妈：没有，那时候也没有电脑。

examples.en: They didn’t have phones either.
They didn’t have tablets either.
examples.cn: 那时候也没有平板电脑。

en: Peppa Pig: What did they do all day?
cn: 小猪佩奇：那他们整天都做什么？

sentence.en: What did they do all day?

examples.en: What did they eat all day?
What did they play all day?

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, if I was the queen I would eat as much cake as I wanted.
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，如果我是王后，我会想吃多少蛋糕就吃多少。

sentence.en: I would eat as much cake as I wanted.
sentence.cn: 我会想吃多少蛋糕就吃多少。

examples.en: I would play as much as I wanted.
examples.cn: 我会想玩多少就玩多少。

examples.en: I would sleep as much as I wanted.
examples.cn: 我会想睡多少就睡多少。

en: Narrator: Peppa imagines being a queen.
cn: 旁白：佩奇想象自己是王后。

examples.en: George imagines being a dinosaur.
Daddy Pig imagines being a king.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸想象自己是国王。

en: Peppa Pig: Mmm, delicious.
cn: 小猪佩奇：嗯，真好吃。

en: Mummy Pig: Is there anything else you would care for, Queen Peppa?
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇王后，还想要什么吗？

sentence.en: Is there anything else you would care for, Queen Peppa?
sentence.cn: 佩奇王后，还想要什么吗？

examples.en: Is there anything else you would like to eat?
Is there anything else you would like to drink?

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, more cake, please.
cn: 小猪佩奇：要的，请再来点蛋糕。

en: Mummy Pig: Of course.
cn: 猪妈妈：当然可以。

en: Daddy Pig: Come on, everyone.
cn: 猪爸爸：大家快来。

en: Peppa Pig: Coming, Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：来了，爸爸。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, I’m Queen Peppa.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，我是佩奇女王。

en: Peppa Pig: You must bow when you speak to me.
cn: 小猪佩奇：你和我说话要鞠躬。

sentence.en: You must bow when you speak to me.

examples.en: You must bow when you meet the queen.
You must bow when you greet the king.

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, I’m most terribly sorry, your royal highness.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，非常抱歉，殿下。

en: Peppa Pig: And what do you do?
cn: 小猪佩奇：你是做什么的？

en: Daddy Pig: I’m your daddy.
cn: 猪爸爸：我是你爸爸。

en: Peppa Pig: That must be very interesting.
cn: 小猪佩奇：那一定很有趣。

en: Daddy Pig: Yes, it’s very interesting.
cn: 猪爸爸：是的，很有趣。

en: Peppa Pig: And what room is this?
cn: 小猪佩奇：这个房间是什么？

examples.en: And what language is this?
And what game is this?

en: Daddy Pig: This is the dinosaur room.
cn: 猪爸爸：这是恐龙展厅。

en: Peppa Pig: The dinosaur room?
cn: 小猪佩奇：恐龙展厅？

en: Peppa Pig: George, this is the dinosaur room.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，这里是恐龙展厅。

en: George: Dinosaur.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。

en: Peppa Pig: Where is the dinosaur?
cn: 小猪佩奇：恐龙在哪里？

en: Daddy Pig: He’s somewhere in the room.
cn: 猪爸爸：它就在这个房间里。

examples.en: He’s somewhere in the garden.
He’s somewhere in the house.

en: Peppa Pig: I can’t see him. He must be very small.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我看不到，他一定很小。

sentence.en: I can’t see him. He must be very small.

examples.en: I can’t find my toy. It must be very small.
examples.cn: 我找不到我的玩具，它一定很小。

examples.en: I can’t hear you. You must be very quiet.
examples.cn: 我听不到你，你一定很安静。

en: Daddy Pig: Actually, Peppa, he’s very big.
cn: 猪爸爸：其实，佩奇，他很大。

en: Peppa Pig: Wow!
cn: 小猪佩奇：哇！

en: Daddy Pig: These are the bones of a real dinosaur.
cn: 猪爸爸：这些是真正恐龙的骨头。

sentence.en: These are the bones of a real dinosaur.
sentence.cn: 这些是真正恐龙的骨头。

examples.en: These are the bones of a real animal.
examples.cn: 这些是真正动物的骨头。

examples.en: These are the bones of a real fish.

en: George: Dinosaur, grr.
cn: 乔治：恐龙，嗷。

en: Narrator: George imagines being a big dinosaur.
cn: 旁白：乔治想象自己变成了一只大恐龙。

en: Peppa Pig: It’s a dinosaur! Help, help!
cn: 小猪佩奇：是恐龙！救命，救命！

en: Mummy Pig: The dinosaur room is George’s favourite room.
cn: 猪妈妈：恐龙展厅是乔治最喜欢的房间。

en: Peppa Pig: My favourite room is the king and queen’s room.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我最喜欢国王和王后的房间。

sentence.en: My favourite room is the king and queen’s room.
sentence.cn: 我最喜欢国王和王后的房间。

examples.en: My favourite room is the kitchen.
My favourite room is the living room.

en: Mummy Pig: And it looks as if Daddy Pig is already in his favourite room.
cn: 猪妈妈：看来猪爸爸已经在他最喜欢的房间了。

sentence.en: it looks as if Daddy Pig is already in his favourite room.
sentence.cn: 看来猪爸爸已经在他最喜欢的房间了。

examples.en: it looks as if John is already done with his homework.
examples.cn: 看来约翰已经完成了他的作业。

examples.en: it looks as if the party is already starting.

en: Peppa Pig: Which room is that, Mummy?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，哪个房间？

en: Mummy Pig: The room with the cakes in.
cn: 猪妈妈：有蛋糕的房间。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig’s favourite room is the museum cafe.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸最喜欢的房间是博物馆的咖啡厅。

en: Daddy Pig: Come on, tuck in.
cn: 猪爸爸：大家快吃吧。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh, yes. This is a very nice room.
cn: 小猪佩奇：是啊，这个房间真不错。
